title: My Gaming Girlfriend
overview: The game character Jiang Yuyan unexpectedly comes to the real world. She receives the help of a game designer, Qin Yi, but she mistakenly takes his partner Chen Hongfeng as the Third Prince from the game world.However, Chen Hongfeng uses Jiang Yuyan to harm Qin Yi. In the end, Jiang Yuyan exposes Chen Hongfeng's conspiracy and assists Qin Yi in completing his creation.The feelings between the two intensify rapidly. After they confess their love and their romantic relationship reaches fruition, Jiang Yuyan suddenly disappears. She returns to the game world once againâ€¦
